tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CreditScores (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    credit_score INT,
    debtor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE IncomeInformation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    debtor_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE RepaymentCapacity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    credit_score INT,
    income DECIMAL(10, 2),
    repayment_capacity DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE credit_score (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  score INT
)

CREATE TABLE income_information (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  annual_income FLOAT,
  income_source TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE repayment_history (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  payment_date DATE,
  amount_paid FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE debt_capacity (
  debtor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  max_debt_allowed FLOAT,
  interest_rate FLOAT
)
